subject: Golf
Conventions, Fairs and Trade Shows
lead_paragraph: After 2001, many exhibitors at the P.G.A. Merchandise Show scaled back, but the event, seen as a barometer of golf’s health, has shown renewed energy.
snippet: After 2001, many exhibitors at the P.G.A. Merchandise Show scaled back, but the event, seen as a barometer of golf’s health, has shown renewed energy.
